definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Chapter five , the estimation of cultivated land resource sustainable use in Hotan region.
sentences.chinese: 第五章，和田地區耕地資源利用持續性評價。

sentences.english: All four cases are from Hotan Prefecture, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China.
sentences.chinese: 所有四個病例都來自中國新疆維吾爾自治區和田地區。

sentences.english: Hetian Prefecture belongs to extreme arid climate, The habitat is quite bitter.
sentences.chinese: 和田地區屬極端乾旱荒漠區，生境十分嚴酷。

sentences.english: Chapter three, the situation of development and land resource use in this area .
sentences.chinese: 第三章，和田地區耕地資源動態變化。

sentences.english: Media reports initially said the protests occurred over two days in Khotan prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 媒體最初報導說，抗議發生在和田地區，持續了兩天。
